briefTitle: CYP2D6 Genotyping by AmpliChipTM CYP450 for Tamoxifen-Treated Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: CYP2D6 Genotyping by AmpliChipTM CYP450 for Tamoxifen-Treated Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Tamoxifen efficacy for avoiding breast cancer relapse in relation to CYP2D6 genotype
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female
* Age \> 18
* Treated with Tamoxifen following diagnosis of breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* None
